abstract: The chief executive of Sanofi-Aventis reiterated his belief that French company’s $18.5 billion hostile bid for Genzyme represented good value for the U.S. biotechnology firm, saying: “Nothing in what Genzyme has said in recent weeks would cause us to change our offer.”
snippet: The chief executive of Sanofi-Aventis reiterated his belief that French company’s $18.5 billion hostile bid for Genzyme represented good value for the U.S. biotechnology firm, saying: “Nothing in what Genzyme has said in recent weeks would cause u...
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis, after reporting strong third-quarter earnings on Thursday, reiterated that it believed its $18.5 billion hostile takeover bid for the American biotechnology firm Genzyme represented good value.

headline.main: Sanofi Posts Strong Profit and Defends Genzyme Bid
